title: Way to many scripters
body:
Why admins can't handle those fuking scripters?
everytime I join AI Coop, there are at least 2 scripters on my side

sometimes I get 4 scripters and lose like a fuking retard.

replies.body:
they are even in ARAM mode,
this is really getting out of hand, it is a serious problem, Riot, DO SOMETHING

Wait.. did i just read.. You're LOSING.. To.. BOTS  .....
Perhaps suggesting getting into PVP isn't the best idea...
You seem to forget that we all started somewhere.
Nah it'll be fine, he should play against people with his own elo in PVP. I think a mix of both at his level is good.

Careful. 
Technically you're right, some of them are scripters, but usually that term is used for people who use scripts to acheive better mechanics. The players you're referring too are botters.

Sadly this wont be dealt with for a long time, it's actually been this exploitable since the start. So I suggest getting into some PVP.
